item.title: Complex Numbers
item.description: These numbers are complex, they are hard to understand, just like your ex. Except they don’t sleep with your best friend and give you chlamidia.

item.title: Closed Form Equation
item.description: A closed form equation in mathematics is an equation that can be represented using a finite number of primitive equations, i.

item.title: The floor and ceil functions
item.description: There are two important functions that will come in handy throughout this course, ceil $\lceil x \rceil$ and floor $\lfloor x \rfloor$.
